Subject: ALARM! Iron Fist defends itself
Message-ID: <8knr5k+l10i@...>

User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82

  Alarms started bellowing through the warship. Panzertron swore.

  "Someone's trying to breach the hull," he said to Zardus. He tapped 
a display monitor in the corridor. The area under attack came up, 
showing some unfamilar transformers attmepting to use plasma grenades 
to burn through the hull.

  "They'll be in for quite a surpirse," Panzertron said. On the 
monitor a porbe extended from the side of the ship.

  "The underwater hull is covered with those," he said," First line 
of defense. We didn't use them on our last visitor becuase we like to 
keep aces up our sleeves. Now watch."

   The probe started sparking. On the monitor the energon levels in 
the water rapidly rose past the red safety bar.
